name: Chess Evaluate
description: Evaluate a chess position using Stockfish at a given depth
author: Example

fen.description: Chess position in Forsyth-Edwards Notation (e.g., 'rnbqkbnr/pppppppp/8/8/8/8/PPPPPPPP/RNBQKBNR w KQkq - 0 1')

depth.description: Stockfish analysis depth (1-30). Higher values give better evaluation but take longer. Default: 15

time_limit_ms.description: Maximum analysis time in milliseconds. Used if depth not reached. Default: 1000
